trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Leggett
There were no other sightings in Leggett on or around March 31st 1990
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on country road and made a right hand turn onto a drive way and looking to my N.E. when I noticed a perfect circle of golden light that in retrospect I would estimate from where I was sitting that it may had been 3 feet diameter and the distance it may had been is diffcult to determine,Possibley 500 feet where the road ahead of me made a right curve and the cliff was to the left with fur trees growing up out of the canoyn and the ridge road side. The object was at a 45 degree angel when I first noticed it and it came straight down very, very, slowly . It was not falling.And i sat there and watched it until it dissapeared from sight. I never saw anything more awesome than that. I Witness is My mother. Report taken by Paula Schurle 4-20-09
